CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 6, 1962, pg. 9, reads: "ALPHA WIVES PRESENT AWARD - The Alpha Wives, a group composed of wives of members of Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity, presented a scholarship award to Roland Norad recently when the organization met at the home of Mrs. Nadine Primas. Mrs. Cecilia [Cecile] Springer, president, made the presentation.  Left to right: Mmes. Gladys McCullough, Oteria Nicholson, Merlise Angel, Marguerite Walter, Betty Moncrief, Nadine Primas (hostess, standing behind soda), Alyce Parr, Doris Strothers, Mrs. Springer, Mr. Nored, Elise Bennett, chairman; Madelyn Hairston, co-chairman; Loretta Green, Fannie Williams, LeBertha Nicklas [Lee Bertha Nicklos] and Merle [Murrel] Wynn Jones. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Alpha Wives presenting scholarship to Roland Norad, surrounded by, from left: Gladys McCullough, Oteria Nicholson, Merlise Angel, Marguerite Walter, Betty Moncrief, hostess Nadine Primas standing behind sofa, Alyce Parr, Doris Strothers, Cecile Springer handing paper to Roland Nored, Elise Bennett, Madelyn Hairston, Loretta Green, Fannie Williams, Lee Bertha Nicklos, and Murrel Wynn Jones, posed in Primas home with portrait of woman, ruched curtains, and ceiling with exposed beams
